title: Russia: Bank in One Touch for Citibank Retail Clients
summary: Moscow - Citibank has announced launch of its Mobile Bank application to empower its clients to access and manage their accounts using any Internet connections that are supported by their mobile phone.
tag-1: Russia: Bank in One Touch for Citibank Retail Clients
tag-3: Moscow – Citibank has announced launch of its Mobile Bank application to empower its clients to access and manage their accounts using any Internet connections that are supported by their mobile phone.
tag-4: An updated version of Citi Mobile is available for all mobile phones whose devices support any internet connections at www.mobile.citibank.ru, and as a mobile phone application for iOS and Android* platforms.
tag-5: "The number of Citi Mobile bank users has grown two times between 2010 and 2011. Just in April, our clients made over 350,000 transactions with their mobile phones," says Tatiana Shpakova, Alternate Channels Director at Citibank. "The Citi Mobile application is designed to save the time of our customers and make the management of accounts easier, quicker and more convenient."
tag-6: Citi Mobile allows the bank's customers to view account information, including their latest transactions; pay mobile, Internet, television, utility and other bills; transfer funds between accounts, including currency exchange at Citibank's rate; transfer funds across Russia; open time deposits; and view Citibank's current exchange rates. Citi Mobile can also help locate a Citibank ATM, branch or Citigold center in the relevant area.
tag-7: To find the Citi Mobile application for iOS and Android platforms at the App Store** or Google Play***, they just need to type "Citibank RU" in the search bar.
tag-8: To log on to Citi Mobile, the client needs to use the same User ID and Password as used to sign on to Citibank Online. If the client does not have a User ID and password yet, he or she will need to set them up on the Citbank Online sign-on page. The User ID and password will be valid for both Citi Mobile and Citibank Online.
tag-9: * Android is the registered trademark of Google Inc. ** App Store is the service trademark of Apple Inc.  *** Google Play is the service trademark of Google Inc.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-11: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-12: ZAO Citibank ZAO Citibank, a full subsidiary of Citi, has been operating in Russia since 1993. At present ZAO Citibank is among the country's largest banks offering a full range of products and services to corporate and consumer customers. Citibank has over 3,000 employees; its distribution network includes retail branches, 550 ATMs and representative offices in largest cities in Russia, Citi also operates in Ukraine and Kazakhstan. The number of the bank's consumer clients has exceeded 1,000,000 Russians. www.citibank.ru.
